title: How long should the battery be charged for the first several timesï¼Ÿ
answer:
It is recommended that the customer service personnel answer this question as follows: When the battery is fully charged, the charging can be stopped. The process takes about 3–4 hours.
Previously, nickel-cadmium batteries that have the memory effect are used. If a nickel-cadmium battery is not fully charged for the first several times, the battery cannot be fully charged in future. Therefore, the charging duration should be longer for nickel-cadmium batteries.
The Li-ion batteries currently used have no memory effect. Therefore, the charging can be stopped only when a Li-ion battery is fully charged.
